data.criteria: Three independent researchers (H.B., H.S., and H.-G.J) conducted the literature search and data extraction, while a fourth researcher (J.-W.H). adjudicated unresolved disagreements through discussion. We removed irrelevant articles or duplicates after reading the titles and abstracts and further screened the full texts of the remaining articles. If a study tested the efficacy of multiple apps, both apps were included in the analysis as intervention apps. If studies used more than 1 depression scale as an outcome measure, the primary outcome measures were pooled for review. We also contacted the authors of studies with missing or partially reported outcomes to obtain the necessary information.31,32,33
